As The Millionaire Next Door revealed, building wealth isnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t just about working harder or what you choose to invest in: itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s about spending smarter. Now, award-winning Tribune Company personal finance columnist Gregory Karp shows how to do just that.
